danger_zone

Class DangerControlTCP

  • java.lang.Object
    • danger_zone.DangerControl
      • danger_zone.DangerControlTCP

  • public class DangerControlTCP
extends DangerControl
    Since:
    2012-11-18 KD Tree / Listening Object Interface for the danger zone application. Provides a wrapper for an interface to the all important Danger Zone K-d(2) Tree

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      (package private) BayesTrainer classifier
      Classifer interface to allow for feed back to the classifier from incoming command messages.
      (package private) java.net.ServerSocket clientListener
      Socket to accept incoming queries to the Danger Control interface, listens on port 5480
      (package private) static boolean continous
      Variable to control continous listening by the server instead of a time out.
      (package private) DangerNode dangerZones
      Data Structure to hold the dangerZones from the database.
      (package private) static boolean debugOn
      Debug variable, if specified as true, output messages will be displayed.
      (package private) java.net.Socket incoming
      Socket that will hold the incoming traffic coming from the clientListener
      (package private) static int int_timeout
      Timeout for the DangerControl program's clientListener, this must be set in integer form (Seconds)
      (package private) long long_timeout
      Timeout for the DangerControl program itself, this is used during debugging and will probably be removed in release implementations
      (package private) static int port_number
      Port number to communicate to the client with
      static java.lang.String URL_TO_SEND_TO
      The url that the output of the commands will be send to

      • run

        public void run(boolean continous)
         throws java.lang.Exception
        Run the instance of Danger Control continously without a timeout, only a kill message passed or a kill command from the OS will shut down the instance
        Specified by:
        run in class DangerControl
        Parameters:
        continous - True for if the control structure should run the entire time, false will result in this instance not running at all.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
